thread.title: VaynerMedia to Move Manhattan Headquarters to Hudson Yards
thread.title_full: VaynerMedia to Move Manhattan Headquarters to Hudson Yards - WSJ

author: Keiko Morris
title: VaynerMedia to Move Manhattan Headquarters to Hudson Yards
text:
Social-media agency VaynerMedia is moving its Manhattan corporate headquarters to Hudson Yards.
The digital marketing and advertising agency’s new corporate headquarters will occupy more than 88,000 square feet of space at 10 Hudson Yards, a 1.7-million-square-foot tower set to open in Manhattan’s far west side next year, said developer Related Cos. VaynerMedia will join Coach Inc., L’Oréal USA and software engineering company SAP... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
